message_thread.content:
1. Parse data from the following JSON file: {'Course_Proposal_Form': {'null': ['Course Title: Creating Stunning Digital Graphics with\xa0Canva', 'Organization: INNOHAT TRAINING PTE. LTD.', 'Learning Outcomes', 'LO1 - Develop visual communication projects in Canva, blending typography with media elements.', 'LO2 – Create Canva storyboards to communicate visual intention to team members and evaluate designs to suggest visual enhancements.', 'LO3 – Develop strategies for Canva designs, critiquing and collaborating to improve visual communication based on best practices.', 'Duration: 3 days (16 hrs),', 'Instructional methods: Lecture (11 hrs), Didactic Questioning, Demonstration, Practical (11 hrs)', 'Assessment method: 1 hr WA-SAQ, 1 hr (PP)', 'TSC – Visual Communication DSN-COM-4005-1.1', 'TSC Knowledge', 'K1: Elements of typography, logos, other visual communication design, and information design', 'K2: Best practices in visual communication', 'K3: Uses of relevant design software packages', 'K4: Colour fundamentals and forms', 'K5: Techniques for analysing aesthetics', 'TSC Ability', 'A1: Initiate visual communication ideas through exploration', 'A2: Develop visual communication outputs by integrating media, materials, processes and environment', 'A3: Create storyboards and task flow designs to communicate visual intentions to team members', 'A4: Evaluate the design work of stakeholders', 'A5: Propose suggestions to enhance the visual formats of designs', 'A6: Critique own work or work with others to enhance visual communication outputs', 'A7: Develop strategies to enhance the appeal of visual communication outputs', 'TSC Mapping', 'Learning Units'], 'LU1: Fundamentals of Design with Canva (K1, K3, K4, A1, A2)': ['Topic 1: Introduction to Canva and Basic Design Principles (A1, K1, K3)', "Navigating Canva's interface and features", 'Principles of typography and logo design', 'Basics of visual communication design', 'Creating simple designs and layouts', "Experimenting with Canva's text and image tools", 'Topic 2: Colour and Form in Canva Design (A2, K4)', 'Fundamentals of colour theory and application', 'Exploring colour schemes and palettes in Canva', 'The role of forms and shapes in design', 'Practical exercises on colour and form harmonization', 'Designing for different environments and contexts'], 'LU2: Advanced Visual Communication in Canva (K5, A3, A4, A5)': ['Topic 3: Storyboarding and Flow Design in Canva (A3, K5)', 'Techniques for creating effective storyboards', 'Developing task flows for visual projects', 'Utilizing Canva for ideation and conceptualization', 'Case studies of effective storyboard designs', 'Hands-on exercises in storyboard creation', 'Topic 4: Best Practices and Aesthetic Analysis in Canva (A4, A5)', 'Understanding and applying design best practices', 'Techniques for aesthetic and functional analysis', 'Critiquing and improving Canva projects', 'Workshop on designing with user experience in mind', 'Group activities for peer review and feedback'], 'LU3: Enhancing and Strategizing Visual Communication (K2, A6, A7)': ['Topic 5: Critical Review and Enhancement Strategies in Canva (A6, K2)', 'Methods for critiquing visual designs', 'Strategies for effective visual communication', 'Workshops on enhancing existing Canva designs', 'Collaborative exercises for peer-to-peer learning', 'Techniques for iterative design improvements', 'Topic 6: Innovative Approaches to Design in Canva (A7, K2)', 'Developing innovative design strategies', 'Exploring advanced features and tools in Canva', 'Case studies of successful visual communication', 'Group projects for practical application', 'Presentations on innovative design solutions']}}
    2. Fix spelling errors, and missing LUs if any.
    3. Ensure that the LUs do not have the same name as the Topics.
    4. Return a full JSON object with all the extracted data according to the schema.

{
    "Course_Proposal_Form": {
        "null": [
            "Course Title: Creating Stunning Digital Graphics with Canva",
            "Organization: INNOHAT TRAINING PTE. LTD.",
            "Learning Outcomes:",
            "LO1: Develop visual communication projects in Canva, blending typography with media elements.",
            "LO2: Create Canva storyboards to communicate visual intention to team members and evaluate designs to suggest visual enhancements.",
            "LO3: Develop strategies for Canva designs, critiquing and collaborating to improve visual communication based on best practices.",
            "Duration: 3 days (16 hrs)",
            "Instructional Methods:",
            "Lecture (11 hrs)",
            "Didactic Questioning",
            "Demonstration",
            "Practical (11 hrs)",
            "Assessment Methods:",
            "Written Assessment (1 hr)",
            "Practical Performance (1 hr)",
            "TSC Mapping:",
            "TSC Title: Visual Communication",
            "TSC Code: DSN-COM-4005-1.1",
            "TSC Knowledge:",
            "K1: Elements of typography, logos, other visual communication design, and information design",
            "K2: Best practices in visual communication",
            "K3: Uses of relevant design software packages",
            "K4: Colour fundamentals and forms",
            "K5: Techniques for analysing aesthetics",
            "TSC Abilities:",
            "A1: Initiate visual communication ideas through exploration",
            "A2: Develop visual communication outputs by integrating media, materials, processes and environment",
            "A3: Create storyboards and task flow designs to communicate visual intentions to team members",
            "A4: Evaluate the design work of stakeholders",
            "A5: Propose suggestions to enhance the visual formats of designs",
            "A6: Critique own work or work with others to enhance visual communication outputs",
            "A7: Develop strategies to enhance the appeal of visual communication outputs",
            "Learning Units"
        ],
        "LU1: Introduction to Canva Design (K1, K3, K4, A1, A2)": [
            "Topic 1: Introduction to Canva and Basic Design Principles (A1, K1, K3)",
            "Navigating Canva's interface and features",
            "Principles of typography and logo design",
            "Basics of visual communication design",
            "Creating simple designs and layouts",
            "Experimenting with Canva's text and image tools",
            "Topic 2: Colour and Form in Canva Design (A2, K4)",
            "Fundamentals of colour theory and application",
            "Exploring colour schemes and palettes in Canva",
            "The role of forms and shapes in design",
            "Practical exercises on colour and form harmonization",
            "Designing for different environments and contexts"
        ],
        "LU2: Storyboarding and Flow Design (K5, A3, A4, A5)": [
            "Topic 3: Storyboarding and Flow Design in Canva (A3, K5)",
            "Techniques for creating effective storyboards",
            "Developing task flows for visual projects",
            "Utilizing Canva for ideation and conceptualization",
            "Case Study of effective storyboard designs",
            "Hands-on exercises in storyboard creation",
            "Topic 4: Best Practices and Aesthetic Analysis in Canva (A4, A5)",
            "Understanding and applying design best practices",
            "Techniques for aesthetic and functional analysis",
            "Critiquing and improving Canva projects",
            "Workshop on designing with user experience in mind",
            "Group activities for peer review and feedback"
        ],
        "LU3: Enhancing Visual Communication (K2, A6, A7)": [
            "Topic 5: Critical Review and Enhancement Strategies in Canva (A6, K2)",
            "Methods for critiquing visual designs",
            "Strategies for effective visual communication",
            "Workshops on enhancing existing Canva designs",
            "Collaborative exercises for peer-to-peer learning",
            "Techniques for iterative design improvements",
            "Topic 6: Innovative Approaches to Design in Canva (A7, K2)",
            "Developing innovative design strategies",
            "Exploring advanced features and tools in Canva",
            "Case Study of successful visual communication",
            "Group projects for practical application",
            "Presentations on innovative design solutions"
        ]
    }
}
